verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If I perish, I perish,
But I'm going to see the King
If I perish, I perish,
But I'm going to see the King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Through hard trials, tribulations,
persecution, trouble and all
I'm going to see the King.
Through hard trials, tribulations,
persecution, trouble and all
I'm going to see the King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've made up my mind to go on,
I've made up my mind to surrender my all,
I've made up my mind to pay the price,
I've made up my mind to go on.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Have you made up your mind ...?
